titleInfo.title: On the Steps of Barry Hall

mods.abstract: The CBC Community poses on the steps of Barry Hall: I. Leo O'Donnell, Camillus Dufresne, Bernard LoCoco, Louis Althaus, Emery Hogan, Justin Lucian, Tony Pisano, Lawrence Egbert, Clair Battersby, Edmund Whaley, Dominic Dunn, Philip Morgan, Jerome Wegener, Norman McCarthy, Alfred Moroni, Cyril Conroy, Robert Staud, Carl Koch, Vincent O'Neill, Vincent Malham, Edward Doody, Marvin Becker, Chad Baker
mods.accessCondition: While CBU may house an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under copyright law.
